title: Languages
description: The languages.json file is a simple array of locale codes that specifies which language translations are available in this resource pack. Located at texts/languages.json in resource packs.

tokens.text: defines available language translations for this resource pack

fields.title: Language Code
fields.description: A locale code identifying a language translation (e.g., en_US, de_DE, ja_JP).

note: This file is a JSON array at the root level, containing string locale codes. Each locale code corresponds to a .lang file in the texts/ folder that provides translations.
